name: Underground Quest
description:
Hello! This is my first prototype on the RPG Maker engine. I really enjoyed making this game and I would really appreciate some feedback. I'm new to game dev but I intent to get better at different aspects.

I didn't have much time to polish my game but I think you can get the general idea of my inexpertise on the topic.

There is no real story behind my game, I just created the story as I was creating because of time. Not a lot of planning and a lot of learning to do. Please enjoy and thank you. Merci à tous.
